text: Dhudial is a village and Union Council, an administrative subdivision, of Chakwal District in the Punjab Province of Pakistan, it is part of Chakwal Tehsil. It is one of the largest villages of Chakwal District and is located at 33°3'52N 72°58'24ELocation of Dhudial - Falling Rain Genomics about 70km south of the capital Islamabad. ==Tribes== The following are the majority tribe population. * Awan (اعوان) * Quresh (قریش) * Rana (انڈین مہاجر) * Ansar (انصار) * Gondal (گوندل) * Sadaat (سادات) * Mughal Kasar (مغل کسر) * Minhas (منہاس) * Bazigar (بازی گر). * [Bhatti] (بھٹی) ==References== Category:Union councils of Chakwal District
title: Dhudial
